properties.Text: Q0304. Details on labour and implements used in Crop Production (Weeding, Irrigation, Harvesting, Threshing, Emergencies
Labour use and other expenditure on Weeding / Inter-cultivation in the plot, including input application
Labour use and other expenditure on Irrigation in the plot, including input application
Labour use and other expenditure on Harvesting in the plot
Labour use and other expenditure on Threshing and Transport
Labour use and other expenditure on Supervision (of plots or crop), emergencies and other activities, which are not covered preceding cost items
Irrigation Cess cost (not covered inpreceding items)
